midpoints.name: The Fool
midpoints.description: The boundless faith and brilliant insight that fuels the quest

midpoints.name: The Magus
midpoints.description: The sacred marriage of conscious will and unconscious instinct

midpoints.name: The Priestess
midpoints.description: The direct telepathic link to universal wisdom from the deep subconscious

midpoints.name: The Empress
midpoints.description: The archetype of fertile, abundant, and beautiful creation

midpoints.name: The Emperor
midpoints.description: The natural authority that orders the world by sheer focused presence

midpoints.name: The Hierophant
midpoints.description: The embodiment of teaching - the Word made Flesh and put into motion

midpoints.name: The Lovers
midpoints.description: The foundational principle of reconciliation that births the quest

midpoints.name: The Chariot
midpoints.description: The synthesis of all 21 powers - the mean of all 7 Axles

midpoints.name: Adjustment
midpoints.description: The intellectual faculty that processes data into perfect forward momentum

midpoints.name: The Hermit
midpoints.description: The profound state of psychological solitude required for the quest

midpoints.name: Fortune
midpoints.description: The critical link between individual purpose and the cycles of cosmic opportunity

midpoints.name: Lust
midpoints.description: The untamed primordial power of the sphinxes, yoked to personal will

midpoints.name: The Hanged Man
midpoints.description: Power through perfect alignment with higher law - strength through yielding

midpoints.name: Death
midpoints.description: The unyielding clearing away of the obsolete to make way for the new

midpoints.name: Art
midpoints.description: The supreme skill of blending the four elements while in motion

midpoints.name: The Devil
midpoints.description: The temptation to mistake the armor for the man, the vehicle for the destination

midpoints.name: The Tower
midpoints.description: The penetrating truth-bearing force that annihilates all built on lies

midpoints.name: The Star
midpoints.description: The atmosphere of grace and hope that rushes into the vacuum of destruction

midpoints.name: The Moon
midpoints.description: The boundary between formless cosmic terror and structured reality

midpoints.name: The Sun
midpoints.description: The unfailing internal fire that prevents freezing within steely resolve

midpoints.name: The Aeon
midpoints.description: The consequence that accumulates with every action toward final judgment

midpoints.name: The Universe
midpoints.description: The ecstatic surrender of individuality to rejoin the Everything

trios.name: The Context of the Journey
trios.description: The mythic DNA of your personal quest - the beginning, the sacrifice, and the destination
trios.meaning: From what impulse was the journey born? Through what sacrifice did you learn to steer? Toward what reckoning do you drive?

trios.name: The Engine of Vitality
trios.description: The kinetic heart - ignition, transmission, and fuel
trios.meaning: Your core energy, capacity for synchronized luck, and radiant joy

trios.name: The Navigation System
trios.description: The inner compass - divine perception, intellectual rigor, and psychic endurance
trios.meaning: Your intuition, balance mechanisms, and ability to navigate uncertainty

trios.name: The Relationship with Form
trios.description: The drama of embodiment - purpose, discipline, and temptation
trios.meaning: What you create, the solitude required, and the trap that threatens

trios.name: The Arsenal of Will
trios.description: The active power - authority, primordial drive, and devastating impact
trios.meaning: Your power to command, your raw drive, and your capacity to shatter illusions

trios.name: The Process of Transformation
trios.description: The alchemical work - new law, cleansing dissolution, and renewed grace
trios.meaning: The wisdom you embody, what you must clear away, and the light you leave behind

trios.name: The Alchemical Great Work
trios.description: The ultimate purpose - primal union, supreme skill, and final dissolution
trios.meaning: The choice that starts it, the skill that sustains it, the wholeness that completes it

27.name: The Masterpiece Anointed
27.description: The perfection of the physical vessel, anointed with cosmic destiny

147.name: The Victor's Revelation
147.description: The awakening of the soul's fire, recognizing its divine sovereignty

267.name: The Gateway to the Infinite
267.description: The conscious alignment with the Galactic Center and cosmic source
